title: Dune: A Masterclass in World-Building
description: Denis Villeneuve's adaptation of the sci-fi epic is a cinematic triumph, blending stunning visuals with a deeply resonant narrative. A closer look at what makes it unforgettable.

title: The M4 AstroBook: A Developer's Dream?
description: After a month with Apple's latest hardware, I'm sharing my thoughts on its performance, battery life, and whether it's the ultimate machine for modern web development.

title: Finding Creative Flow in Augusta
description: Moving away from the hustle of a big city was a creative gamble. Here's how the quiet charm of Martinez and the surrounding area has reshaped my daily process and inspiration.
